meanings.definition: The act or process of converting a device or system to use transistors.
meanings.sent1: The transistorizations of the old radios made them more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The factory's transistorizations improved the performance of the machinery.
meanings.sent3: The scientist's attempt at transistorizations on the toaster turned it into a music player!
meanings.sent4: Her transistorizations of the garden sprinkler system transformed it into a dancing fountain.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration of transistorizations was both educational and entertaining.

meanings.definition: The state of being equipped with transistors.
meanings.sent1: The transistorizations in the new computer allowed for faster processing.
meanings.sent2: The car's improved performance was due to the recent transistorizations.
meanings.sent3: The robot's transistorizations gave it a futuristic and advanced look.
meanings.sent4: The city's complete transistorizations resulted in energy savings and better technology.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship's flawless transistorizations ensured a successful mission.
